Name: Explosive Candy World
About the game: Forget about running and jumping. In Explosive Candy World you have to EXPLODE your way to the end of the level! It's a physics-based platformer game with a fun and weird movement mechanic. Use your mouse or analog stick to adjust the strength, then release to throw a mighty explosive candy! Throw it at buttons, switches, breakable stuff, or even at yourself! Features Over 80 explosive levels scattered across 4 candy worlds (+ 1 secret world) Cute, colorful pixel art Original retro soundtrack An unusual platformer, for fans of the genre who are tired of samey gameplay The game has absolutely zero text, except for names and numbers. It's non-stop gameplay, with no reading! Some levels can be quite tricky, but keep trying! You respawn very fast and the levels are short and sweet
